items.summary: Implement a backend canister method `createGoalWithCustomDuration(description, timeFrame, motivation, durationDays)` that creates a goal with `durationDays` persisted (non-zero) and returns the new goal id, so the Auto Planner flow can save plans that specify a custom duration.
Fix the Auto Planner “Save & Lock In” flow to reliably create the goal, add milestones/weekly tasks/daily tasks, and lock in the goal, with clear user feedback when any step fails.
